content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** derpy tiger bucket hat 1 ** we re crafting something inspired by **kpop demon hunters** its the **derpy bucket hat** if you re a fan of practical crochet or simply like me love kpop demon hunters this tutorial is perfect for you what do you think of this cool derpy hat derpy is my favorite demon kitty cat right now doesn t he look adorable as a hat join us as we guide you through the entire process of making derpy inspred bucket hat with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll find yourself singing up up up as you corchet the parts of your own derpy bucket hat in no time i m pretty sure you ll find this tutorial project both enjoyable and rewarding do note that this a project where you have to crochet many parts and sew them on it will take a little more time than the usual projects you will need * yarn - weight 4 yarn of any sort you like in medium blue for the hat about 80 -100 grams and the ears - small amounts of pale yellow orange and red yarn for the eyes - some black or dark brown for the eye outline stripes and dots - small amount of dark pink for the nose - small amount of light pink and white yarn for the inner ear * crochet hook * scissors * pins * yarn needle i used weight 4 yarn and a 3mm hook if you want your derpy bucket hat to be the same size as mine use any yarn that can fit well on a 3mm/no 5 hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet parts of derpy s face so you can have a derpy hat * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals * tips on how to layout and attach derpy s parts ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that has a practical use and would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/4sk1ovqy06w
